verses.roman:
eta bali' sabākāre īṣat hāsiñā
vidāya karila prabhu sammāna kariñā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; sabākāre—to all the devotees; īṣat hāsiñā—smiling very mildly; vidāya karila—bid them farewell; prabhu—the Lord; sammāna kariñā—showing all respect.
translation: In this way, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, offering due respects to all the devotees and smiling very mildly, bid them farewell.
